# Data process

## Finland


### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `SYNTVUOSI` |
|----------|------------|
| **Label** | `Year of birth` |
| **Table name** | `t00_athlos_2017_02_23` |
| **Description** |  |

```{r assign1, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'Health20002011_w1_ybirth','Health2000-2011.t00_athlos_2017_02_23',
                         variables=list('SYNTVUOSI'), missings = TRUE)
Health20002011_w1_ybirth <- opal.execute(o,'Health20002011_w1_ybirth')
```

```{r local1, echo=F}
vari <- Health20002011_w1_ybirth$SYNTVUOSI
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = "SYNTVUOSI") 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(Health20002011_w1_ybirth, aes(SYNTVUOSI)) + geom_histogram(stat="count", fill="steelblue") + xlab("Year of birth") + ylab("Frequency") 
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
The harmonized variable is the same than the study-specific variable, but the missing values have to be recoded as follows:

* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1}
Health20002011_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=Health20002011_w1_ybirth$id)
Health20002011_ds_w1$ybirth <- car::recode(Health20002011_w1_ybirth$SYNTVUOSI, "NA=999")
Health20002011_ds_w1$ybirth <- labelled(Health20002011_ds_w1$ybirth, labels = c("Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

#### Statistics of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript1, echo=F}
vari <- Health20002011_ds_w1$ybirth
kable(Continuous_summary(var = vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = "Year of birth")
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(Health20002011_ds_w1, aes(ybirth)) + geom_histogram(stat="count", fill="steelblue") + xlab("Year of birth") + ylab("Frequency")
```

### Wave 2 

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `SYNTVUOSI` |
|----------|------------|
| **Label** | `Year of birth` |
| **Table name** | `t00_athlos_2017_02_23` |
| **Description** |  |

```{r assign2, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'Health20002011_w1_ybirth','Health2000-2011.t00_athlos_2017_02_23',
                         variables=list('SYNTVUOSI'), missings = TRUE)
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'Health20002011_w2_id','Health2000-2011.t11_athlos_2017_02_27',
                         variables=list('OSITE'), missings = TRUE)
Health20002011_w1_ybirth <- opal.execute(o,'Health20002011_w1_ybirth')
Health20002011_w2_id <- opal.execute(o,'Health20002011_w2_id')
```


```{r local2, echo=F}

Add_indiv <- function(old, new){
  
  new_2 <- matrix(NA, nrow = dim(new)[1], ncol=dim(old)[2])
  oldm <- as.matrix(old)
  
  for(i in 1:length(new$id)){
    if(sum(new$id[i]==old$id)>=1){
      new_2[i,] <- oldm[which(new$id[i]==old$id),]
    } else {
      new_2[i,] <- c(new$id[i], NA)
    }
  }
  
  new_22 <- data.frame(id=new_2[,1], SYNTVUOSI=as.numeric(new_2[,2]))
  new_22
}



Health20002011_w2_ybirth <- Add_indiv(old = Health20002011_w1_ybirth, new = Health20002011_w2_id)


vari <- Health20002011_w2_ybirth$SYNTVUOSI
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[3], caption = "SYNTVUOSI") 
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(Health20002011_w2_ybirth, aes(SYNTVUOSI)) + geom_histogram(stat="count", fill="steelblue") + xlab("Year of birth") + ylab("Frequency") 
```

## Summary of descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves





```{r summ, echo=F}

l.hds <- list(w1 = Health20002011_ds_w1, w2 = Health20002011_ds_w2)
m.hds <- list()

for(name in names(l.hds)) {
  aux_object <- l.hds[[name]]
  label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label
  l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cont_label)
  aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
  aux_object[[2]] <- labelled(aux_object[[2]], labels = cont_label)
  m_name <- paste0("Health20002011_m_ds_",name)
  assign(m_name, aux_object)
  m.hds[[name]] <- get(paste0("Health20002011_m_ds_",name))
  rm(aux_object)
}

t.summ <- summary(m.hds[[1]][2])[1:6]
t.hds <- substr(t.summ,1,regexpr(":", t.summ, fixed=T)-1)
for (i in seq_along(l.hds)){
  t.summ <- summary(m.hds[[i]][2])[1:6]
  t.hds <- cbind(t.hds,as.numeric(substr(t.summ,regexpr(":", t.summ, fixed=T)+1,nchar(t.summ))))
}
t.hds <- rbind(t.hds,c("sample size", sapply(l.hds,function(wave) length(wave[[1]]))))

dimnames(t.hds)[[2]] <- c(dimnames(summary(m.hds[[1]][2]))[[2]],names(l.hds))
kable(t.hds,caption=ds_label)



```
